import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import './Product.css' const Product = () => { const getData=(image,title,price)=>{ let tempData=[image,title,price] console.log(); } const[product,setProducts]=useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:5000/card') .then(res => setProducts(res.data.cards)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) },[]) console.log(product); return (

FEATURED PRODUCTS

{product&&product.map((productss)=>(
{/*

*/}
getData(productss.image, productss.title, productss.price)}>QUICK VIEW
{productss.title} {productss.price} AZN
))}
) } export default Product
